description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
name of the participant
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
sex of the participant
role of the participant –whether a participant in the dyad was the owner of items or not- per default role is always owner
name of the participant_2
age presented in years  of the participant_2 – see metadata for source of age
sex of the participant_2
role of the participant_2 – whether a participant in the dyad was the owner of items or not -per default role is always non-owner
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee
genus of individuals participating in the study – pan/gorilla/pongo
name of the two participants that compose the dyad
id of the dyad composed by the first letter of the species and number
session number- there were four sessions in total
presentation of the experiment to the participants - usually numerical
trial number- each session had four trials
species subgroup at time of data collection – WKPRC chimpanzee group a or b/ etc
condition  simult = both individuals have access to the food at the same time / delayed = one individual has immediate access to the food and the other one is blocked for some time
whether the owner is domit (yes) or not (no)
whether this individual is the start individual in the delayed condition (yes) or not (no)  in the simultaneous condition both had access at the same time (both)
sex of the owner (f=female / m=male)
number of own items this individual retrieved (range=0-2)
number of the other partner's items this individual retrieved (range=0-2)
total number of items this individual retrieved (range=0-4)
